channel.title: RsGama [317] - Yz's server base - Working barrows - Working duel - Stable -
channel.description:
[b]Introduction[/b] Considering I have been creating private servers for a long time, not many people know me much more. A few people would like Si force and M.dog but that's about it. Anyway, I have been creating private server for at least 4 years now, have had some successful ones and have had ones that are total failure. Besides from that, I am hoping to make a decent come back and make this server.
[b]Permission from staff[/b] I have had permission from Niall to make this development here is a picture of the proof [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/proof.png[/img]
[b]The server[/b] Here's a little about the server.
[b]Better Barrows[/b] [i]This barrows have now got the tunnel, you will need to kill five of the barrow bosses and then go through the puzzle tunnel to retrieve your prize.[/i]
[b]HighScores[/b] [i]I have created a highscore system, credits to Snowball for the Highscore page.[/i]
[b]Magic timers are changed.[/b] [i]Working 80 - 100% like Runescape[/i]
[b]Pictures and information.[/b] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/Starterguide.gif[/img] This was actually from the emulous server, I have to modify the codes a lot fro it to work with Yz's server base.
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/barrows.gif[/img] I have added a 75% working barrows, it has the barrow caves but does not have the puzzle tunnel yet, this will be added soon. There is also a few bugs with the barrows, when you do one trip you cannot do it again, this will be fixed soon.
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/duelarena.gif[/img] The duel arena is working 100% I cannot provide any pictures of the duel in till the server is hosted.
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/fletching-1.gif[/img] Working fletching, I am now working on the X amount and the magic logs interface.
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/smithing1.gif[/img][img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/smithing2.gif[/img] Working smithing, there is a few "Sendmessage" glitches that need to be fixed, but nothing much.
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/karamja.gif[/img] Karamja training, cave and agility works.
[img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/itemsondeath.jpg[/img] This is the clue scroll reward, I have changed the items now so there is level 1, 2 and 3 rewards.
[b]The bans cover[/b] [i]7 day ban 10 day ban 30 day ban Permanent ban 7 day mute 10 day mute 30 day mute Permanent mute.[/i]
[b]Mysql character saving[/b] I have removed the MYSQL saving, but I have used a different method with Apache POI to ban members with tems, perm, mute and other things, that seems to work fine.
[b]Development[/b] We are not recruting more staff, the forums are going well and the server development will be made by me and me only.
[b]Current Development[/b] I have now started the development these last few days. Considering I have had very little time on the computer I have achived a lot. Skills and minigames, monsters and better econemy.
Edit: We changed the name from Klonoa to RsGama
Thank you.

I Uk 0wn4g3 I:

item.title: RsGama [317] - Yz's server base - Working barrows - Working duel - Stable -
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Efilite, post:1, topic:277169”]
I know what your thinking - “It’ll lagg the server! every 3 seconds of saving!”
No. Because it is saving to my website I will have no lagg at all.[/quote]

If you are saving via MySQL, then yes, that will cause massive lag. As a connection is opened, information is sent through the connection, the connection is closed, and more connections are opened in a nonstop motion.

Read full topic

item.title: RsGama [317] - Yz's server base - Working barrows - Working duel - Stable -
item.dc:creator: @J0o_2pac J0o 2pac
item.description:
@J0o_2pac wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:21, topic:277169”][quote author=Efilite link=topic=365823.msg2774677#msg2774677 date=1241463742]

I know what your thinking - “It’ll lagg the server! every 3 seconds of saving!”
No. Because it is saving to my website I will have no lagg at all.
[/quote]
Every 3 seconds! That is sure to lagg even if your writing the files to the local machine! Every 60 seconds is more than enough and plus if your saving it to “your” website I wont be suprised when you get complaints from your host about execcesive bandwidth usage.
When you think about it, if 50 people are using this server at one time and theres on average 15 people online… and your saving a 3-10kb file every 3 seconds for 24/7 thats a lot of data.

Niall didnt look too happy![/quote]
Well if he’s paying for the bandwith, i dont think their will be a problem, but i think it should be every 10 seconds because even with 3 seconds you’ll get a little lag unless this guy is buying a dedi with super bandwith

Read full topic

I know what your thinking - “It’ll lagg the server! every 3 seconds of saving!”

Every 3 seconds! That is sure to lagg even if your writing the files to the local machine! Every 60 seconds is more than enough and plus if your saving it to “your” website I wont be suprised when you get complaints from your host about execcesive bandwidth usage.
When you think about it, if 50 people are using this server at one time and theres on average 15 people online… and your saving a 3-10kb file every 3 seconds for 24/7 thats a lot of data.

Niall didnt look too happy!

item.title: RsGama [317] - Yz's server base - Working barrows - Working duel - Stable -
item.dc:creator: @SonGoku SonGoku
item.description:
@SonGoku wrote:

[quote=“J0o 2pac, post:18, topic:277169”][quote author=SonGoku link=topic=365823.msg2778469#msg2778469 date=1241649272]

For instance a player by the name of "John" is playing, and his character is saving it's file every 3 seconds automatically.
I know what your thinking - "It'll lagg the server! every 3 seconds of saving!"
No. Because it is saving to my website I will have no lagg at all.

His diskspace would be eaten by the .txt saving, so it does matter in the sense that nothing is being stored on his pc, he just needs a fast processor and some good ram…

It doesn’t matter where it is saving. + Mysql takes longer than using a bufferedwriter.
[/quote][/quote]

Databases take up more space J0o 2pac.

Read full topic

For instance a player by the name of "John" is playing, and his character is saving it's file every 3 seconds automatically.

item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Your work looks really good rich dude, I accept your application.

J0o 2pac:

ok, copy and pasting stuff from other sources, then going to a c&p tut and adding mysql saving isn’t really “getting it done”

You can’t say that I’m a leecher with out any proof. I have not copied any tutorials, and have not leeched stuff from other sources.
Besides that, there is not a tutorial for saving files on a hosters database.

Read full topic

I have completed half of what I want, skills work, pking work, and it’s a very stable base, only thing left is to add NPC’s and a few objects. I have also added mini games that work.
